game.name: Insurgency
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Valve Anti-Cheat enabled, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Take to the streets for intense close quarters combat, where a team's survival depends upon securing crucial strongholds and destroying enemy supply in this multiplayer and cooperative Source Engine based experience.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take to the streets for intense close quarters combat, where a team's survival depends upon securing crucial strongholds and destroying enemy supply in this multiplayer and cooperative Source Engine based experience.

reviewHighlights.text: playing with friends, no big learning, A great game. No brag just fact
great game where you go to chiraq to assassinate osama bin trappin or something
